features: Compatibility: 2009 to 2018 Dodge Ram 1500, 2010 to 2018 Dodge Ram 2500 3500

This product features as a replacement and upgrade for the old third brake light seal gasket, made of thicker and firmer foam, prevent water from leaking in effectivly, also more durable than the old one, ideal solutionn for the annoying water leak problem

0.2 inch (5 mm) thick foam gasket will leave about 1/8 inch gap outside between the housing edge and vehicle body after installed, it won't void the waterproof function for protecting the inside part, make sure your understand and accept this design before ordering
High quality third brake light assembly seal with the adhesive backing, easy to peel off and make the light stay in place, no weather strip adhesive needed

Package includes: 1 gasket and 1 manual;90 day manufacturer warranty since order purchase date.Feel free to send email if there's any issue before or after purchase. Your case will be taken seriously regardless of warranty period.
body.description: This item is used for third brake light. With the convenience of an easy peel off adhesive backing , the material can be put in place, then moved for slight adjustments, stays in place for installation. It's a pretty good choice to replace the old and dull part as an ideal solution for the water leak problem. Check Compatibility table before ordering. Package includes: 1 gasket with 1 manual Compatibility: 2009-2018 Dodge Ram 1500 2010-2018 Dodge Ram 2500 2010-2018 Dodge Ram 3500 Specifics and Features: Foam seal , Enough thick foam can provide excellent waterproof performance. Made of high quality material,can be used for long time normally Easy to install, perfect cutting edge makes the installation become simpler Warranty and Customer Service: 1. 90 Day manufacturer warranty since order purchase date. 2. Feel free to send email first if there's any issue before or after purchase. All emails will be replied within 24 hours. Your case will be taken seriously regardless of warranty period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fit my 2015 dodge ram 1500 perfectly. It also did its job and stopped my little water leak, which these rams are notorious for. Removing the old gasket was a bigger pain that expected, but the install was easy enough otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked Very Well
reviews.reviewText: Easy to mount and very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and fixes a common leak point on Dodge Ram trucks
reviews.reviewText: My 2010 Dodge Ram was getting significant amounts of water in the back seat when I went through the car wash. After a little research, I found that the 3rd brake light, which is in the center top of the cab is a common leak point. I removed the light and found that the gasket was completely rotten. I changed it and the leaks stopped. If your Dodge Ram has water leaks, this is a quick, easy, inexpensive thing to change before paying a shop hundreds of dollars for a leak test.This gasket worked perfectly and was easy to install. It was also inexpensive.Do make sure and clean all the old gasket material off. There will be a lot of residue if yours is as rotten as mine was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy install, The new gasket was a little thicker than the old one. Not enough to notice after installation.Much better foam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stopped one of the leaks
reviews.reviewText: So my 2018 ram had/has 3 leaks. This fixed one of them. After discovering that I’ve apparently had a leak (turned out to be 3 leaks) I started digging into known causes for this truck. The cab air pressure relief vents were leaking pretty bad, so I replaced those. Still leaking. Then I used this to fix the brake light leak. This fit well and stopped that leak. I still have another leak. There is apparently a leak on the actual rear window itself and I’ll have to get the glass removed and resealed. Hope this helps someone track down their leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked as it should. No more water getting in the cab of our 2014 Ram Truck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exact fit and replacement of OEM Gasket. Ordered 2 other truck wasn’t leaking yet. Old gasket sux to remove btw..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Leaks WORSE than before!
reviews.reviewText: Have the notorious leaking 3rd brake light (much worse now) and came across this brand via a YouTube video.In the video, the gasket looked a lot thicker than what I received and the reviewer had nothing but praise for it, so I used the link in his description which brought me here to make the purchase.Took the third brake light out and brought it in the house to compare the old to this new one. Believe it or not, my factory gasket was slightly thicker…Anyway, I removed the old gasket using 3M’s adhesive remover, then washed with soap and water. It was clean down to the plastic.Installed the gasket on the brake light and went outside to install.After install I looked around the brake light and noticed the middle sections (both top and bottom) where not compressed like the sides. (I understand fastener location)It bothered me enough to try different screw tightnesses and the little adjustments I could make.Same outcome. Went in the house and filled a standard pint glass full of water and went back out and slowly poured it over the brake light.I then dried the exterior off with a kitchen towel and let it sit for about 15 minutes. (I have a black truck). I made sure there was no pools of water around the brake light gasket and slowly removed only to find water pooled up inside. Simply from a glass of water. Unreal…Now I have a third brake light that leaks SIGNIFICANTLY worse than it did before.One thing to note, there are people talking about having adhesive on both sides and others on only one side. Mine only had adhesive on one side.Needless to say, I’m pretty aggravated…

reviews.reviewTitle: Clean the old one off, place the new one on after removing the tape, worked great.

reviews.reviewText: The gasket went in very easy and we have had some rain and no leaking yet
This is wayyyyy too small for this application . Does not fit at all at least 3 inches too short !
It kept the rain out. Back rug isn't wet anymore
